classification.task_goal: Predict additional survival time for remaining patients in an oncology clinical trial based on observed data.
primary_constraints: Provide example code in R software.
Include step-by-step explanation of the code.
Consider baseline characteristics of patients (age, gender) in predictions.
Account for the time already survived by patients in predictions.
classification.reasoning: The AI initially failed to incorporate the time already survived by patients in its predictions, which was a critical constraint. The user pointed this out, and the AI subsequently revised the code to address this issue, thus repairing the violation.
